title: A RESOLUTION RATIFYING THE MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) ENTERED AND SIGNED BY THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON WITH THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES, THROUGH ITS CONSTITUENT UNIVERSITY, UP OPEN UNIVERSITY WITH OFFICE ADDRESS AT NATIONAL HIGHWAY, BARANGAY MAAHAS, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA WITH THE PURPOSE OF FACILITATING ACADEMIC/INSTITUTION COOPERATION AND EXPLORING OPPORTUNITIES AS SPECIFIED IN THE AGREEMENT.
